summary: A transformation that converts input images and segmentation masks into PyTorch tensors, automatically reordering dimensions from HWC to CHW for images, adding a channel dimension for grayscale inputs, and optionally transposing mask dimensions to match channel-first format.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of image and mask data into PyTorch models by providing a reliable, probability-controlled conversion step that ensures tensors have the correct shape and channel ordering for training and inference pipelines.
